document.full_text: economics, rather than politics was behind the collapse of this week's opec talks and the group as a whole would act if it grew worried about oil supplies running short, a top opec official said on thursday.
document.title: opec ready to act if needed, split was over data
lines_and_colors: economics, rather than politics was behind the collapse of this week's opec talks and the group as a whole would act if it grew worried about oil supplies running short, a top opec official said on thursday.
